column1: AATSR overpasses for each day of the campaign
The maps are arranged cronologically, with one for each day. Each
map corresponds to an approximately 24 hour period ending early in the
morning (5:30 am at the lastest). Hence the map labelled as "25 - 26
August" covers the period from approx. 4 am on the 25th to 4 am on the
26th of August. Click on the image for a larger view, or use the text
